backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor with extensive types for tasks, financial operations, user profiles, verification, bans, and state maps for storing app data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking tap-to-earn optimistic UI, batching, and ad-trigger changes to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains concise descriptions of many frontend files, including hooks, pages, components, utilities, and theme settings.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color tokens and applies base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper handling authentication, profile onboarding, policy gate, theming, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/app/AppShell.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, footer, and profile view toggle with ban banner support.
Three-tab navigation component switching between Earn, Finance, and E‑Service sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button switching between login and logout while handling Internet Identity state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/kyc/Verification: Shows a dialog prompting users to verify email or NID before accessing restricted features, with messaging based on the verification type.
frontend/src/components/policy/BanNotice: Displays a banner warning banned users with the ban reason and restrictions pulled from ban status.
frontend/src/components/policy/PolicyAcc: Blocks app usage until the user reads and accepts terms and privacy policy, storing acceptance in localStorage per principal.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for creating a user profile with basic info and referral code, saving via mutation with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/referrals/Referr: Shows the user's referral code with copy support and displays the number of referrals.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAccessCont: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status via actor queries.
Hooks to query a user's ban status and perform ban/unban mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile, handling loading states and errors.
Fetches user documents and provides a mutation for uploading encrypted sensitive documents.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useEarnings.t: Fetches the user's earnings balance and referral bonus using actor queries.
Hooks for fetching and submitting e-service requests with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useFinance.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and submitting micro-loan and DPS requests with cache updates and toasts.
Hooks to get referral code, list referrals, and register a referral with cache invalidation.
Provides React Query hooks for fetching tap-to-earn state, registering taps (single or batched), and claiming tap-to-earn rewards.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTasks.ts: Defines hooks to load task catalogs, completed tasks, and to start or submit completion of tasks with server updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useWithdrawal: Hooks for retrieving withdrawal requests and submitting new withdrawal requests while updating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context handling login, stored identity loading, and identity lifecycle via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useTapBatching.ts: Handles batching of tap events with timed or size‑based flushes and optimistic UI updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color variables and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBanPanel.t: Admin UI component enabling banning and unbanning users via form inputs and corresponding mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/earn/EarningsDashboar: Displays balance, task earnings, referral counts, and bonus percentages using data from earnings and referral hooks.
frontend/src/pages/earn/EarnLanding.tsx: Main earn hub that switches between landing, tasks, withdraw, and tap-to-earn views using state and card navigation.
frontend/src/pages/earn/TapToEarnPage.ts: Implements tap-to-earn gameplay with ad triggers, optimistic tap batching, banning checks, and coin claiming logic.
frontend/src/pages/earn/TaskCatalog.tsx: Fetches and groups tasks by type, showing selectable task cards that open a detailed task view.
frontend/src/pages/earn/TaskDetail.tsx: Shows task details, allows starting and submitting proof for a task, and disables actions if the user is banned.
frontend/src/pages/earn/WithdrawPage.tsx: Handles withdrawal requests with form inputs for different method types and displays balance and request history with ban checks.
frontend/src/pages/eservices/EServiceHis: Displays a list of the user's e‑service requests with status badges and basic details. Shows a loading state and a message when no requests exist.
frontend/src/pages/eservices/EServiceLan: Provides a landing page for selecting e‑services, navigating to request forms or history. Renders service cards and handles view switching.
frontend/src/pages/eservices/EServiceReq: Renders a form to submit a new e‑service request with validation for bans and email verification. Sends the request and shows alerts or verification prompts as needed.
frontend/src/pages/finance/DollarBuySell: Placeholder page announcing upcoming dollar buy/sell functionality. Shows informational alerts and a coming‑soon card.
frontend/src/pages/finance/DPSPage.tsx: Allows users to create a new DPS savings plan and lists their existing DPS requests. Includes form inputs for amount, term, and purpose with ban restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceLandin: Landing page for finance features, routing users to micro loans, DPS, transfers, or currency exchange. Displays selectable cards for each finance service.
frontend/src/pages/finance/MicroLoanPage: Provides a form to request micro loans with NID verification checks and ban restrictions. Also displays the user's previous loan requests.
frontend/src/pages/finance/MoneyTransfer: Displays a placeholder UI indicating the money transfer feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/kyc/KYCPage.tsx: Provides a KYC document upload form with client-side encryption and status alerts.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: Handles user profile viewing and editing, referral data, and navigation to KYC or admin panels.
frontend/src/types/monetag.d.ts: Adds an optional Monetag ad function to the Window type.
frontend/src/utils/ads/monetag.ts: Loads the Monetag ad script and exposes a function to display ads once loaded.
frontend/src/utils/crypto/clientEncrypti: Implements AES‑GCM encryption and decryption utilities for sensitive document data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for improving Tap-to-Earn responsiveness, listing existing features, known issues, and pending feature requests related to optimistic UI and batched taps.
